attributes.action: Open schools to our children during the 2020-2021, 6 week Summer Holidays.
attributes.additional_details:
Opening schools during the summer holidays of 2020-2021 will assist to:
- allow teachers to fulfil a moral and professional obligation to support children who have lost out on recent education.
- allow families negatively impacted financially by the crisis, to avoid the extra cost of holiday clubs.
- allow the British workforce to work FT during the summer to rebuild our economy.
- allow our health workers to maintain the NHS and have time for personal recovery while children are safe in school.
attributes.background: Direct teachers to open all schools during the summer holidays to continue with the curriculum and education that many of our children have lost out on during the Covid-19 lockdown so that the next generation are not at a disadvantage to other children.
